name: Penguin Tickler Free
description:
He's cute. He's cuddly!

Poke and tickle the Penguin to make him laugh! Interactive Penguin pet for your phone or tablet device. This is the FREE version of Penguin Tickler.

Features:

* Interactive Penguin
* Loads of laughs
* Super cuddly and cute

Compatibility:

* iPhone
* iPod Touch
* iPad
